title: WiSDoM: Interpretable Weakly-Supervised Learning Through Kernel Density Matrices
excerpt: A mathematical deep dive into our PLOS ONE paper introducing kernel density matrices for interpretable medical image classification with built-in uncertainty quantification.

title: Deep Dive: AI Classifier to Predict Docetaxel Benefit in Prostate Cancer
excerpt: A detailed analysis of our Clinical Cancer Research paper on using artificial intelligence to predict which prostate cancer patients will benefit from docetaxel chemotherapy.
